author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: (Tabbed) deck editor - RMB should select row.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on September 27, 2014 01:03:07_

from @jerichopumpkin in forum ( http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=115&p=162942&sid=23e01cd3532414a3fa15a520510346ba#p162819).. .

The only suggestion I have is to let the cards be selected with the right click also, because a lot of times when removing cards from the deck, I right-clicked the one I intended to remove while another one was selected, and the one selected got removed...

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=700_
